pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Python MCAP ROS2 supportThis package provides ROS2 support for the Python MCAP file format reader. It has no dependencies on ROS2 itself or a ROS2 environment, and can be used in any Python project.## InstallationYou can install directly via pip.```bashpip install mcap-ros2-support```## Reading ROS2 Messages```python# Reading from a MCAP filefrom mcap_ros2.reader import read_ros2_messagesfor msg in read_ros2_messages("my_data.mcap"): print(f"{msg.topic}: f{msg.ros_msg}")```## Stay in touchJoin our [Slack channel](https://foxglove.dev/join-slack) to ask questions,share feedback, and stay up to date on what our team is working on.
